statements: DELETE FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE location = 'Garden' AND moisture_level < 50;
DELETE FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE id = 1 AND location = 'Garden'
DELETE FROM Irrigation_Systems WHERE system_id = 100 AND status = 'active';
DELETE FROM Soil_Moisture_Data WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND moisture_level > 0.5;
DELETE FROM Plant_Growth_Data WHERE growth_stage = 'Flowering' AND growth_rate > 0.5;
DELETE FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE location = 'Garden A' AND moisture_level < 5
DELETE FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE plant_id = 101 AND system_id = 3
